info.title: Paperless AI API
info.description: API for Paperless AI document processing

name.description: Name of new tag to create

post.description: Imports the first 10 documents from the specified Paperless instance

get.summary: Get document statistics for a PaperlessInstance (Admin only)

post.summary: Share AiAccounts with user or all users
Share AiModels with user or all users
Share AiBots with user or all users
Share PaperlessInstances with user or all users

get.summary: List documents for a Paperless instance
get.description: Returns a paginated list of documents imported from the Paperless instance

post.description: Uses the specified AI bot to analyze the document and suggest metadata (title, tags, correspondent, document type)

get.summary: Get latest processing result for a document
get.description: Returns the most recent AI analysis result for the specified document
